q5.question: What is Dracula's plan ?
q5.recall: Dracula's plan is to exact revenge on humanity by spreading the plague bacteria and turning Jessica into his consort. He also wants to control Van Helsing and bring him back under his control.
q5.vectordb: Dracula's plan is to make Jessica his consort and spread a plague carried by his "four horsemen" into the world. He wants to exact revenge on humanity and seeks to kill Van Helsing. However, his plan is ultimately foiled when Van Helsing defeats him by driving a fence post through his heart.
